name: UIDragPreview
desc: A graphical preview for a single drag item, used by the system after a drag has started and when no related animation is running.

items.name: init(view: UIView)
items.desc: Initializes a new drag item preview with a view, using the default appearance parameters.

items.name: init(view: UIView, parameters: UIDragPreviewParameters)
items.desc: Initializes a new drag item preview with a view and with a set of appearance parameters.

items.name: init(for: URL)
items.desc: Initializes a new drag item preview with a URL.

items.name: init(for: URL, title: String?)
items.desc: Initializes a drag item preview with a URL and title.

items.name: var parameters: UIDragPreviewParameters
items.desc: The appearance parameters associated with the drag item preview.

items.name: var view: UIView
items.desc: The view associated with the drag item preview.
